channel.title: SSH on D0CUM3NTN4T10N
channel.description: Recent content in SSH on D0CUM3NTN4T10N

item.title: Restricted Shell (rbash, rzsh) Bypass
item.description: After logged in a shell, sometimes we faced the error such as below when executing commands. -rbash: cd: restricted -rbash: /usr/lib/command-not-found: restricted: cannot specify `/' in command names The target system uses a restricted shell so we may not be able to execute commonly used commands e.g. ls, cd, etc. We need to bypass the restriction First. Command Enumeration linkFirst check what commands can we execute. Try running varied commands.
